channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bicycle Hoop outside Co-op has corroded - SE10DG, 21st July
item.description:
Bicycle Hoop outside Co-op on Southwark Bridge road has corroded and is no longer safe to use as it no longer stops bicycle from being stolen. This bike hoop need to be removed and a new one installed in it's place so that residents can safely lock their bicycles when visiting the shops in this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7 day notice left for at least 3 months, 21st July
item.description:
Two abandoned bikes that have been there for 2+ years, the 7 day notice has been on the bikes for at least 3 months now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves from trees along Holmdene Avenue are not being swept, 21st July
item.description:
The leaves are fallen into residents front gardens from trees on the road and also along the foot path but are not being swept up. The resident of 58B Holmdene Avenue has informed me that she slipped up on the wet leaves on the street when she was trying to sweep the road in front of her house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Holmdene Avenue, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet
